articles.title: Slovakia's Fico says he was targeted for Ukraine views, in first speech since assassination attempt - The Associated Press
articles.description: Slovakia’s populist Prime Minister Robert Fico says he believes he was targeted for having a Ukraine position contrary to the European mainstream but bears no malice toward the gunman who seriously wounded him three weeks ago. The prerecorded speech posted on…
articles.content: BRATISLAVA, Slovakia (AP) Slovakias populist Prime Minister Robert Fico said Wednesday he believes he was targeted for having a Ukraine position contrary to the European mainstream but bears no malic… [+3357 chars]
